title: The Cycles Manivelle La Bananadry Is a Bar or Hip Bag
content:
French cycling company Cycles Manivelle just introduced a rather interesting take on the handlebar/hip bag. La Bananadry looks like a bikepacking handlebar roll bag and functions like one, but it also can be worn as a hip bag, keeping all your important items close to your person while riding. La Bananadry comes in four color combinations, has a minimum volume of 4.6 L and a maximum capacity of 12.7 L and is shipping today from Cycles Manivelle.
